berlin.description: My last trip was to Berlin. The photo was taken just after going shopping, I"m a huge fan of it, as you can tell from my face.

default.description: This is where I live -- a small town in the centre of Poland.

disneyland.description: For my 19th birthday I visited France. The picture was taken at Disneyland.

krakow.description: Krak√≥w is previous capital of Poland and one of the most beautiful cities I have ever seen.

kolobrzeg.description: This is a photo of me and Marek at the beach, watching sunset.

matterhorn.description: This is a photo from my first trip to Zuerich, taken at the top of Uetliberg mountain

zurich.description: This is me in front of Matterhorn mountain, known from Toblerone.
